poem:
Title: The Tincture of Morning Economics

Benevolent Tories, seasoning the dawn brew,
Enterprise prairies echo scrapped inheritance, anew.
The young trees, poised for their first climb,
Are offered the scaffolding of fiscal time.
Measured commas embrace March's fiscal render, 
Prime Minister, tell us of this quiet surrenders. 
In the across of daybreak, the taxman wanes,
A gear change whispered in bureaucratic lanes.
